Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Aww,<sp:5:1:0> there's no way I can buy that.

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Oh, come on!<sp:5:0:0> If you want to sell the

StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I'm from <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>, an idyllic little
town in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>.

It's <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>. You should
check it out!
Com_Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I'm sorry.<sp:5:1:0> We're all sold out of that
for now.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Before you buy anything, can I take a
moment to brag?

<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's about my brother. He's becoming a
big-time chef! Isn't that exciting?

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Though, I haven't heard from him since he
and his friends went to <clr:0000>Riverside Stable <clr:ffff>to
learn more about cooking.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The stable's located <clr:0000>by a river<clr:ffff> on the
<clr:0000>southeastern <clr:ffff>part of Hyrule Field. Maybe
I should go and see how he's doing...
Com_Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Well now... <sp:5:0:0>Looks like you don't have
enough <clr:0000>rupees<clr:ffff>.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>Argh! <sp:5:0:0>I'm done for!<sp:0:4:0>But who's gonna look after my precious
horse when I'm gone?!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>To capture a horse, sneak up on it very
quietly. Very, VERY quietly. Got it?
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Hey... <sp:5:0:0>Looks like your pouch is full.<sp:5:0:0> Come
back when you've made some room.
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>Eek! <sp:5:0:0>What am I gonna do? All my stock
will be ruined! Where's a hero when I
need one?!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>No, nope. No, thank you! <sp:5:0:0>That thing is 
WAY too dangerous to be on the loose!

We don't have enough lives to take on
something like that!
GoRange_03_2:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> is most famous for its
fresh milk. But you absolutely NEED to
try their Hylian tomatoes!<sp:5:0:0>
If you want to visit, go to <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>
in Necluda, and then head <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>I eat good Hateno produce every day!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Sheesh! That was scary.<sp:5:0:0> Thanks for
your help!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>What a wide-open prairie. The horses
around here look so carefree as they
graze and gallop...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know how to capture a horse, right?


You sneak up on them very, very quietly
from behind, and...<sp:5:1:0> That's it!
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>My horse loves trotting around on the
wide, open plain.<sp:5:0:0> I've got a happy steed!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>You sure know how to handle a monster.<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, you wanna know a trick to take down
<clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>wild animals <clr:ffff>easily?

Use your <clr:0000>bow and arrows<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>and aim for
the <clr:0000>head<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>There you go—easy <clr:0000>elixirs<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>cooking
ingredients<clr:ffff>. Though if you're cooking,
you'll need vegetables too...
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I think everyone should go to <clr:0000>Hateno
Village <clr:ffff>in Necluda, <clr:0000>east <clr:ffff>of <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
If for no other reason than the food!
They're most famous for fresh milk,<sp:5:0:0>
but you haven't lived till you've tasted
their Hylian tomatoes!
If you use milk or vegetables in your
cooking, you can't go wrong with
Hateno's finest.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I eat veggies from home every day.<sp:5:0:0>
I never get tired of it!
BackRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> is known for <clr:0000>fresh milk <clr:ffff>and
<clr:0000>vegetables<clr:ffff>. Every time I cook with them,
I'm so proud of my hometown.
You can go there by heading to <clr:0000>Dueling
Peaks <clr:ffff>in Necluda, and then heading <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.

<snd:LaughS_01>And let me tell you, produce from Hateno
is the BEST. Throw 'em in your cook pot—
you'll see!
Com_Talk_05b: <sp:3:0:2:0001>I'm not feeling picky. Sell me whatever.
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0001>What've you got? I'll probably buy it!
RainPoint_01: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Not a fan of this weather, are you?
ShopGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Now... <sp:5:0:0>How about sampling some of
Hateno Village's finest?
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>I have to say, the rumors don't do
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing <clr:ffff>justice! It's full of people
and waaay bigger than I expected.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm from <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of <clr:0000>Dueling
Peaks<clr:ffff>. This is actually my first time
leaving <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>...
Maybe that's why everything is so
impressive.<sp:5:0:0> It's a totally different world.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Leaving made me appreciate Hateno
though.<sp:5:0:0> It's so laid-back and idyllic.
You can really relax.
Plus, <clr:0000>fashion<clr:ffff>'s become really popular
there recently. You've really got to visit!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>No way you're getting out of here without
a little thank-you gift. Here!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Thank you!<sp:5:0:0> I don't know what I would've
done without you!
SavedLv2_01: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Whoa, you put on quite the show!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Monsters<clr:ffff> and<clr:0000> wild animals <clr:ffff>all have a weak
spot...<sp:5:1:0>the <clr:0000>head<clr:ffff>. Aim your arrows there!

What's my weakness? <sp:5:1:0>That's easy—
fresh vegetables!
Com_Talk_11_c:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you very much!<sp:5:1:0> That'll definitely
come in handy for you!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I really am proud of my brother for
following his passions.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>But I miss him. He went to <clr:0000>Riverside
Stable<clr:ffff> with his friends to learn more about
cooking and never came back.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's <clr:0000>by a river <clr:ffff>on the <clr:0000>southeastern <clr:ffff>part
of Hyrule Field. Maybe I'll drop in and
see how he's doing.
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Thanks for seeking me out in this terrible
weather. <sp:5:0:0>I'm sure you'll find a product
here that's perfect for you!
GoalPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, hey there! Listen up, 'cause I've got
a tip for you.

They keep <clr:0000>Cuccos <clr:ffff>at<clr:0000> Riverside Stable<clr:ffff>,
which is to the east. And—here's the
tip—you can get eggs from 'em! 
All you need to do is...give 'em a
good scare!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>They call that the cluck of the draw! Hehe.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>If you're attacked by a<clr:0000> monster <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>wild
animal<clr:ffff>, take out your <clr:0000>bow and arrows<clr:ffff>
and aim straight for the <clr:0000>head<clr:ffff>!
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Thanks to you and your wallet, I'm out of
stock today!
GoalPoint_01_4:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive><clr:ffff>You can get a<clr:0000> Cucco<clr:ffff>'s<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>eggs if you give it
a good scare! But don't go crowing this
tip all over, got it?
Com_Talk_37:

shopping with me!

I might be out of stock, but I can offer
an exclusive preview of my upcoming
offerings. Wanna take a look?
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It feels so good to be out on the plains!<sp:5:1:0>
My friend seems to be enjoying it too.

Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Stop looking at me like that.<sp:5:0:0>
It might seem like I'm alone, but my
best friend is right here.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>See?<sp:5:0:0> My bestie's got four legs and a
pretty mane. Hehe!
ShopGreet_01_3:
I also sell <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>, the popular
new product from Hateno Pasture!
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If a<clr:0000> monster <clr:ffff>or<clr:0000> wild animal <clr:ffff>attacks, don't
panic. Take a deep breath, take out your
<clr:0000>bow<clr:ffff>, and nock an arrow.
Then aim for the <clr:0000>head<clr:ffff>!


If you hit 'em right in the sweet spot...<sp:5:1:0>
Heh. <sp:5:0:0>You'll see!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rain seems to make everyone upset.
But not me!

I find the sound of it soothing. Besides,
there are some animals who only come
out when it's raining.
And the plants need that moisture!
BackRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> is famous for <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff>
and produce, like <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>!
They're tasty and nutritious.
You COULD eat them raw...<sp:5:0:0>but they're
even better if you <clr:0000>cook <clr:ffff>'em up first.

If you wanna visit Hateno for yourself,
go to <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks <clr:ffff>in Necluda, and then
head <clr:0000>eastward<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Just wait till you start cooking with fresh
milk and produce.<sp:5:0:0> Culinary perfection!
Com_Talk_12:

SavedLv3_00:
